## AtomEventListener type

**Signature:**

```typescript
type AtomEventListener<T> = {
    (payload: T, 
    abort: (reason?: string) => void): void | Promise<void>;
    __atom_event__options__?: AtomEventListenerOptions;
    __atom_event__target__?: any;
};
```
